title: Polyfill-Loader
subtitle: This polyfill experiment loads the required webxr polyfill only when needed by detecting device capability, improving performance, reducing errors and ensuring compatibility for non-webXR capable devices.

links.title: An Exploratory Study of Bugs in Extended Reality Applications on the Web

title: Base-ThreeJS-WebXR-Loader
subtitle: Basic implementation of WebXR with Three.js without any external modules

title: BabylonJS Implementation
subtitle: Basic implementation of Babylonjs with WebXR

title: ThreeJS-MultipleCanvas-Experiment
subtitle: This was a experiment to test if a multitude of canvas elements can be used to symultaniously render different experiences in a webpage. but due to time limits and problems that arose simultaniously it was finally abondoned. Nevertheless the code can be explored in the github repository.
